sql.search: SELECT main.uid ,main.enterprise_uid ,main.function_code ,main.function_name ,main.function_type_cd ,main.function_method ,main.function_status_cd ,main.last_execute_start_date ,main.last_execute_end_date ,main.last_execute_machine ,main.last_record_update_date ,main.last_record_insert_date ,main.last_record_update_uid ,main.total_execute_time ,main.total_execute_count ,main.next_execute_date ,main.source_system_name ,main.dest_system_name ,main.remark ,main.insert_user ,main.update_user ,main.insert_date ,main.update_date ,main.record_status ,SYS011.sub_name function_type_name ,SYS012.sub_name function_status_name ,insert_user.user_name insert_user_name ,update_user.user_name update_user_name FROM sys_execute_record main LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary SYS011 ON SYS011.record_status = 1 AND SYS011.main_cd = 'SYS011' AND SYS011.sub_cd = main.function_type_cd LEFT JOIN sys_dictionary SYS012 ON SYS012.record_status = 1 AND SYS012.main_cd = 'SYS012' AND SYS012.sub_cd = main.function_status_cd LEFT JOIN sys_user insert_user ON insert_user.uid = main.insert_user LEFT JOIN sys_user update_user ON update_user.uid = main.update_user WHERE main.record_status = 1
sql.releaseExceptionLock: UPDATE sys_execute_record SET -- 待执行 function_status_cd = '01' WHERE -- 执行中 function_status_cd = '02' AND last_execute_machine = :lastExecuteMachine
